info.title: HrFlow.ai
info.description: HrFlow.ai is the 1st multi-layer AI powered API that brings intelligence to your HR Data and bridges the gap between all your data Sources and Destinations.

post.description: Extracts over 50 data point from any raw input text.

texts.description: Each text can be: the full text of a Job, a Resume, a Profile, an experience, a Job and more. For **optimum speed** the amount of given texts should be less than 16 and a multiple of 2.
example: A professional responsible for overseeing a team of salespeople and sales
Heading an enterprise data science division requires strong skills in NLP and ML

message.example: Tagging predictions ended successfully in 1.63 seconds!

post.description: Predicts tags for a text with our library of AI algorithms.

algorithm_key.description: AI tagging algorithm you want to apply to the input text. More information about each tagger on [here](https://developers.hrflow.ai/reference/tag-a-text).

texts.description: Each text can be: the full text of a Job, a Resume, a Profile, an experience, a Job and more. For **optimum speed** the amount of given texts should be less than 16 and a multiple of 2.
example: Data Insights Corp. is seeking a Senior Data Scientist for a contract-to-direct position. You will be responsible for designing and implementing advanced machine learning algorithms and playing a key role in shaping our data science initiatives. The CDI arrangement offers a pathway to a full-time role

DataTech Solutions is hiring a Data Scientist for a fixed-term contract of 12 months. You will work on various data analysis and modeling projects and assisting in short-term projects; with the possibility of extension or permanent roles

labels.description: List of output tags if algorithm_key ="tagger-hrflow-labels".

context.description: A context for given labels if algorithm_key="tagger-hrflow-labels".
context.example: The CDI is a Contrat à Durée Indeterminée - essentially an open-ended or permanent employment contract.  The CDD is a Contrat à Durée Determinée - a fixed-term or temporary employment contract.  These are the two most common types but by no means the only form of French employment contract. The contracts have to be drawn up by the employer, who must ensure that it's legally the correct type for the circumstances.

top_n.description: Number of predicted tags that will be returned.

post.description: Generates an image from a job description.

text.description: Job text that describes the image to be generated. Ideally it should include a "Job title".

width.description: Width of the image. The width of the image should be among the following pixel values: **[256, 512].**

post.description: Finds synonyms or the top n most similar words to a word.
Retrieves geojson data for any textual location input.

texts.description: Geocode a list of locations. For **optimum speed** the amount of given texts should be less than 16 and a multiple of 2.

post.description: Extracts text from a document across all formats.
This endpoint allows you to vectorize a text.

text.example: I love using embeddings in order do transfer learning with my AI algorithms

post.summary: Index a Profile into a Source
post.description: This endpoint allows you to Index a Profile object.

message.example: Profile parsed successfully. Profile extraction finished in 1.94 seconds.

post.summary: Parse a Resume into a Source
post.description: Parses a resume and creates a profile from it.

parameters.name: source_key
parameters.description: The key of the source attached to the profile

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Profile's resume file in binary format

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Identification key of the profile, it is used for overriding

parameters.name: debugger
parameters.description: Select **1** to get the raw parsing object

get.summary: Score Profiles indexed in Sources for a Job
get.description: Scores profiles indexed in sources for a job.

get.summary: Ask a question to a Profile indexed in a Source
get.description: This endpoint allows asking a question based on a Profile object.

parameters.name: questions[]
parameters.description: Questions based on the queried profile.

get.summary: Match Profiles indexed in Sources to a Profile
get.description: Match Profiles indexed in Sources to a Profile.

get.summary: Grade a Profile indexed in a Source for a Job
get.description: This endpoint allows grading a Profile for a Job.

post.summary: Index a Job into a Board
post.description: Indexes a job object into a board.

get.description: This endpoint allows you to Search Jobs.

get.summary: Score Jobs indexed in Boards for a Profile
get.description: This endpoint allows you to Score Jobs for Profile.

get.summary: Ask questions to a Job indexed in a Board
get.description: This endpoint allows asking questions based on a Job object.

parameters.name: questions[]
parameters.description: Questions based on the queried job

get.summary: Match Jobs indexed in Boards to a Job
get.description: This endpoint allows you to find Jobs similar to a target Job.

experiences_duration.description: Total number of years of experience

educations_duration.description: Total number of years of education

summary.example: As an AI Researcher Intern at HrFlow.ai, you'll play a vital role in driving the next phase of our exciting expansion. Your role involves developing innovative AI models and algorithms to tackle intricate HR challenges. Collaborating with fellow researchers and engineers, you'll help guide the technical direction and architecture of our AI solutions.

culture.example: We love AI engineering, problem-solving, and business.

responsibilities.example: Designing, implementing, and optimizing AI models and algorithms that solve complex HR challenges.

requirements.example: Enrolled in an advanced degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.

interviews.example: Interview with one of our lead AI Researcher to discuss your experience and qualifications in more detail.

benefits.example: Go fast and learn a lot. High-impact position and responsibilities without any day being the same.

text.example: Harry James Potter was born on June 26th 1997

school.example: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

logo.description: Url of the logo of the school

company.example: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

description.example: Solving mysteries about the Sorcerer's stone

logo.description: Url of the logo of the company

value.example: To defeat the Basilisk, a few key elements: a weapon, courage and determination, quick reflexes and support.

description.example: As an AI Researcher Intern at HrFlow.ai, you'll play a vital role in driving the next phase of our exciting expansion. Your role involves developing innovative AI models and algorithms to tackle intricate HR challenges. Collaborating with fellow researchers and engineers, you'll help guide the technical direction and architecture of our AI solutions.

lng.description: Location's longitude, must be between -180 and 180

lat.title: Latitude
lat.description: Location's latitude, must be between -90 and 90

AlgorithmKey.name: algorithm_key
AlgorithmKey.description: The key of the scoring algorithm

BoardKey.name: board_key
BoardKey.description: The board key attached to the job

SourceKey.name: source_key
SourceKey.description: The source key attachted to the profile

EducationLocationDistance.name: education_location_distance
EducationLocationDistance.description: Set a radius around educations locations (in Km)

ExperienceLocationDistance.name: experience_location_distance
ExperienceLocationDistance.description: Set a radius around experiences locations (in Km)

EducationDurationMin.name: education_duration_min
EducationDurationMin.description: Minimum number of years of education

ExperienceDurationMin.name: experience_duration_min
ExperienceDurationMin.description: Minimum number of years of experience

EducationDurationMax.name: education_duration_max
EducationDurationMax.description: Maximum number of years of education

ExperienceDurationMax.name: experience_duration_max
ExperienceDurationMax.description: Maximum number of years of experience

LocationDistance.name: location_distance
LocationDistance.description: Set a radius around location address (in Km)

Page.name: page
Page.description: The number of the current results' page

UseAlgorithm.name: use_algorithm
UseAlgorithm.description: Turn 0 to switch the Scoring to the Searching only mode

GradingAlgorithm.name: algorithm_key
GradingAlgorithm.description: The key of the Grading Algorithm.
